Texts.Chs: 先驱无人机的控制芯片，能够降低^green;10%reset;的飞船燃料消耗，提供^yellow;30%暗影抗性^reset;和^pink;暗影污染免疫^reset;，附加^green;+3被动研究点数^reset;。
Texts.Eng: The control chip for a Precursor Drone, able to increase fuel efficiency by ^green;10%^reset;, protect you with ^cyan;30% Shadow resistance^reset; and ^pink;Shadow Taint immunity^reset;, and grant ^green;+3 passive research^reset;.
